"685 \u2013 The Battle of Dun Nechtain is fought between a Pictish army under King Bridei III and the invading Northumbrians under King Ecgfrith, who are decisively defeated.", "1217 \u2013 The Second Cartographer Abraham Ortelius issues the first modern atlas.", "1609 \u2013 Shakespeare's sonnets are first published in London, perhaps illicitly, by the publisher Thomas Thorpe.", "1631 \u2013 The city of Magdeburg in Germany is seized by forces of the Holy Roman Empire and most of its inhabitants massacred, in one of the bloodiest incidents of the Thirty Years' War.", "1775 \u2013 Mecklenburg Declaration of Independence signed in Charlotte, North Carolina", "1802 \u2013 By the Law of 20 May 1802, Napoleon Bonaparte reinstates slavery in the French colonies, revoking its abolition in the French Revolution", "1813 \u2013 Napoleon Bonaparte leads his French troops into the Battle of Bautzen in Saxony, Germany, against the combined armies of Russia and Prussia. The battle ends the next day with a French victory.", "1840 \u2013 York Minster is badly damaged by fire", "1861 \u2013 American Civil War: The state of Kentucky proclaims its neutrality, which will last until September 3 when Confederate forces enter the state. Meanwhile, the State of North Carolina secedes from the Union.", "1862 \u2013 U.S. President Abraham Lincoln signs the Homestead Act into law.", "1864 \u2013 American Civil War: Battle of Ware Bottom Church \u2013 in the Virginia Bermuda Hundred Campaign, 10,000 troops fight in this Confederate victory.", "1873 \u2013 Levi Strauss and Jacob Davis receive a U.S. patent for blue jeans with copper rivets.", "1875 \u2013 Signing of the Metre Convention by 17 nations leading to the establishment of the International System of Units.", "1882 \u2013 The Triple Alliance between Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy is formed.", "1883 \u2013 Krakatoa begins to erupt. Tom\u00e1s Estrada Palma becomes the country's first President.", "1908 \u2013 Budi Utomo organization is founded in Dutch East Indies, beginning the Indonesian National Awakening.", "1916 \u2013 The Saturday Evening Post publishes its first cover with a Norman Rockwell painting (Boy with Baby Carriage).", "1920 \u2013 Montreal, Quebec radio station XWA broadcasts the first regularly scheduled radio programming in North America.", "1927 \u2013 Treaty of Jedda: the United Kingdom recognizes the sovereignty of King Ibn Saud in the Kingdoms of Hejaz and Nejd, which later merge to become the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.", "1927 \u2013 At 07:52 Charles Lindbergh takes off from Roosevelt Field in Long Island, New York, on the world's first solo non-stop flight across the Atlantic Ocean. He touched down at Le Bourget Field in Paris at 22:22 the next day.", "1932 \u2013 Amelia Earhart takes off from Newfoundland to begin the world's first solo nonstop flight across the Atlantic Ocean by a female pilot, landing in Ireland the next day.", "1940 \u2013 Holocaust: The first prisoners arrive at a new concentration camp at Auschwitz.", "1941 \u2013 World War II: Battle of Crete \u2013 German paratroops invade Crete.", "1948 \u2013 Chiang Kai-shek elected to be the first President of the Republic of China.", "1949 \u2013 In the United States, the Armed Forces Security Agency, the predecessor to the National Security Agency, is established.", "1956 \u2013 In Operation Redwing (shot Cherokee), the first United States airborne hydrogen bomb is dropped over Bikini Atoll in the Pacific Ocean;", "1965 \u2013 PIA Flight 705, a Pakistan International Airlines Boeing 720 \u2013 040 B, crashes while descending to land at Cairo International Airport, killing 119 of the 125 passengers and crew.", "1969 \u2013 The Battle of Hamburger Hill in Vietnam ends.", "1980 \u2013 In a referendum in Quebec, the population rejects by a 60% vote the proposal from its government to move towards independence from Canada.", "1983 \u2013 First publications of the discovery of the HIV virus that causes AIDS in the journal Science by Luc Montagnier.", "1985 \u2013 Radio Mart\u00ed, part of the Voice of America service, begins broadcasting to Cuba.", "1989 \u2013 The Chinese authorities declare martial law in the face of pro-democracy demonstrations, setting the scene for the Tiananmen Square massacre.", "1990 \u2013 The first post-Communist presidential and parliamentary elections are held in Romania.", "1996 \u2013 Gay rights: The Supreme Court of the United States rules in Romer v. The Romans build a circumvallation, cutting down all trees within fifteen kilometers.", "1416 \u2013 The Council of Constance, called by the Emperor Sigismund, a supporter of Antipope John XXIII, burns Jerome of Prague following a trial for heresy.", "1431 \u2013 Hundred Years' War: in Rouen, France, 19-year-old Joan of Arc is burned at the stake by an English-dominated tribunal. Because of this the Catholic Church remember this day as the celebration of Saint Joan of Arc.", "1434 \u2013 Hussite Wars (Bohemian Wars): Battle of Lipany \u2013 effectively ending the war, Utraquist forces led by Divi\u0161 Bo\u0159ek of Milet\u00ednek defeat and almost annihilate Taborite forces led by Prokop the Great.", "1536 \u2013 King Henry VIII of England marries Jane Seymour, a lady-in-waiting to his first two wives.", "1539 \u2013 In Florida, Hernando de Soto lands at Tampa Bay with 600 soldiers with the goal of finding gold.", "1574 \u2013 Henry III becomes King of France.", "1588 \u2013 The last ship of the Spanish Armada sets sail from Lisbon heading for the English Channel.", "1631 \u2013 Publication of La Gazette, first French newspaper.", "1635 \u2013 Thirty Years' War: the Peace of Prague (1635) is signed.", "1642 \u2013 From this date all honors granted by Charles I are retrospectively annulled by Parliament.", "1806 \u2013 Andrew Jackson kills Charles Dickinson in a duel after Dickinson had accused Jackson's wife of bigamy.", "1814 \u2013 Napoleonic Wars: War of the Sixth Coalition \u2013 the Treaty of Paris (1814) is signed returning French borders to their 1792 extent. The Zoludek Ghetto (in Belarus) is destroyed and all its inhabitants murdered or deported.", "1945 \u2013 World War II: Ratification in Berlin-Karlshorst of the German unconditional surrender of May 8 in Rheims, France, with the signatures of Marshal Georgy Zhukov for the Soviet Union, and for the Western Headquarters Sir Arthur Tedder, British Air Marshal and Eisenhower's deputy, and for the German side of Colonel-General Hans-J\u00fcrgen Stumpff as the representative of the Luftwaffe, Field Marshal Wilhelm Keitel as the Chief of Staff of OKW, and Admiral Hans-Georg von Friedeburg as Commander-in-Chief of the Kriegsmarine.", "1945 \u2013 World War II: The Channel Islands are liberated by the British after five years of German occupation.", "1946 \u2013 King Victor Emmanuel III of Italy abdicates and is succeeded by Humbert II.", "1948 \u2013 Czechoslovakia's Ninth-of-May Constitution comes into effect.", "1949 \u2013 Rainier III of Monaco becomes Prince of Monaco.", "1950 \u2013 Robert Schuman presents his proposal on the creation of an organized Europe, which according to him was indispensable to the maintenance of peaceful relations. This proposal, known as the \"Schuman declaration\", is considered by some people to be the beginning of the creation of what is now the European Union.", "1955 \u2013 Cold War: West Germany joins NATO.", "1960 \u2013 The Food and Drug Administration announces it will approve birth control as an additional indication for Searle's Enovid, making Enovid the world's first approved oral contraceptive pill.", "1961 \u2013 Jim Gentile of the Baltimore Orioles becomes the first player in baseball history to hit grand slams in consecutive innings.", "1964 \u2013 Ngo Dinh Can, de facto ruler of central Vietnam under his brother President Ngo Dinh Diem before the family's toppling, is executed.", "1969 \u2013 Carlos Lamarca leads the first urban guerrilla action against the military dictatorship of Brazil in S\u00e3o Paulo, by robbing two banks.", "1970 \u2013 Vietnam War: In Washington, D.C., 75,000 to 100,000 war protesters demonstrate in front of the White House.", "1974 \u2013 Watergate Scandal: The United States House of Representatives Judiciary Committee opens formal and public impeachment hearings against President Richard Nixon.", "1977 \u2013 Hotel Polen fire: A disastrous fire burns down the Hotel Polen in Amsterdam causing 33 deaths and 21 severe injuries.", "1979 \u2013 Iranian Jewish businessman Habib Elghanian is executed by firing squad in Tehran, prompting the mass exodus of the once 100,000 member strong Jewish community of Iran.", "1980 \u2013 In Florida, Liberian freighter MV Summit Venture collides with the Sunshine Skyway Bridge over Tampa Bay, making a 1,400-ft. section of the southbound span collapse. 35 people in six cars and a Greyhound bus fall 150\u00a0ft. into the water and die.", "1980 \u2013 In Norco, California, five masked gunman hold up a Security Pacific bank, leading to a violent shoot-out and one of the largest pursuits in California history. Two of the gunmen and one police officer are killed and thirty-three police and civilian vehicles are destroyed in the chase.", "1987 \u2013 A Polish LOT Ilyushin IL-62M \"Tadeusz Ko\u015bciuszko\" (SP-LBG) crashes after takeoff in Warsaw, Poland, killing 183 people.", "1992 \u2013 Armenian forces capture Shusha, marking a major turning point in the Karabakh War.", "2001 \u2013 In Ghana 129 football fans die in what became known as the Accra Sports Stadium Disaster.
